articles.title: U.S. Nuclear Blackmail Will Be Foiled with Stronger Military Counteraction: Spokesman
articles.content:
U.S. Nuclear Blackmail Will Be Foiled with Stronger Military Counteraction: Spokesman
 Pyongyang, March 21 (KCNA) -- It is the unshakable will and resolute determination of the service personnel and people of the DPRK to frustrate hostile acts of the U.S. and its satellite forces against the DPRK and defend the sovereignty of the country.
					 However, the U.S. is still making a foolish attempt to test the DPRK's will and dampen its resolute decision through high-handed hostile acts including nuclear blackmail, failing to properly understand about its rival.
					
					 Not content with pushing the Key Resolve and Foal Eagle war drills to the danger line, the U.S. set about making an undisguised nuclear blackmail against the DPRK after introducing mass destructive strike means equipped with nuclear warheads.
					
					 In this regard the spokesman for the Supreme Command of the Korean People's Army (KPA) gave the following answer to the question put by KCNA Thursday:
					
					 As the KPA Supreme Command already clarified, the Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises are evidently dangerous nuclear war drills now under way as part of the most outrageous hostile acts to encroach upon the sovereignty and supreme interests of the DPRK.
					
					 This is a vivid expression of the crudest violation of the Korean Armistice Agreement (AA) and all the north-south agreements. 
					
					 This was precisely the reason why the DPRK took an important decision to totally nullify the AA and declare the north-south declaration on nonaggression and the joint declaration on the denuclearization of the Korean Peninsula invalid.
					
					 The decision reflected the strong will and steadfast determination of the DPRK army and the people to foil the U.S. nuclear war racket with their own nuclear weapons, free from any binding, and wipe out all hostile forces toeing the U.S. policy now that it has become impossible to pin any hope on the validity of the above-said agreements and declarations.
					
					 The U.S. is now introducing B-52, nuclear-powered submarines and other nuclear strike means into south Korea and its vicinity in a bid to test the DPRK's will and break its resolute determination. 
					
					 The flying corps of strategic bombers equipped with nuclear weapons and nuclear-powered submarines serve as "the three major nuclear mainstays" and "the three major nuclear strike means" along with intercontinental ballistic missiles that the U.S. brandishes as means of blackmail as it pleases.
					
					 What should not be overlooked is that the U.S. picked up B-52 and nuclear-powered submarines out of these nuclear strike means to send them to the sky above south Korea and its waters for a nuclear strike drill under the simulated conditions of an actual war against the DPRK. The U.S. is openly calling it a strong warning message to the DPRK and is claiming in public that it would continue such threat and blackmail against the DPRK in the future.
					
					 But the army and people of the DPRK will never be frightened at such a warning message, threat and blackmail.
					
					 The U.S. should not forget that the Anderson Air Force Base on Guam where B-52 takes off and naval bases in Japan proper and Okinawa where nuclear-powered submarines are launched are within the striking range of the DPRK's precision strike means.
					
					 Now that the U.S. started open nuclear blackmail and threat, the DPRK, too, will move to take corresponding military actions.
					
					 The DPRK's declaration that it will react to the nukes of the enemy with nuclear attack more powerful than them is by no means an empty talk.
					
					 The world will clearly see the provocateurs, who hurt the sovereignty of the DPRK, meet a miserable end in the flames of justice kindled by the army and people of the DPRK to defend its sovereignty.

articles.title: Nuclear War Provocateurs Are Bound to Meet Self-destruction: CPRK Spokesman
articles.content:
Nuclear War Provocateurs Are Bound to Meet Self-destruction: CPRK Spokesman
 Pyongyang, March 21 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea issued the following statement on Wednesday:
					 The situation now prevailing on the Korean Peninsula is so tense that a nuclear war may break out due to the north-targeted war exercises being staged by the U.S. and south Korean warmongers in the air, ground and seas.
					
					 Against the backdrop of their extreme war hysteria, Carter, U.S. deputy secretary of Defense, separately met with an official of  Chongwadae, Kim Kwan Jin, minister of Defense, and Yun Pyong Se, minister of Foreign Affairs, in Seoul  on March 18  and had military confabs against the DPRK.
					
					 At the confabs they openly confirmed that they would soon round off the "tailored deterrent strategy" to preempt a nuclear strike at the DPRK. The U.S. prodded the south Korean warmongers into reckless provocations against the DPRK, blustering that the U.S. would not only provide a nuclear umbrella to them but also mobilize all forces including conventional strike capabilities and missile defense capabilities.
					
					 The U.S. went the lengths of opening to public the fact that U.S. B-52 equipped with nuclear weapons would stage a drill for dropping nuclear bombs in the sky above the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 The danger of a nuclear war has reached an extreme phase as the U.S. nuclear submarines armed with nuclear missiles are busy sailing in the waters off the peninsula under the pretext of the Foal Eagle joint military exercises and strategic nuclear bomber is involved in the drill under the simulated conditions of an actual war.
					
					 All these facts made clearer that the joint military exercises of the U.S. and south Korean puppet forces are not "annual defensive ones" but provocative nuclear war maneuvers against the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. has so far waited for an opportunity to ignite a war while introducing huge nuclear war hardware into south Korea every year under the pretext of these drills.
					
					 The present situation goes to prove that the DPRK was entirely just when it had access to nuclear weapons as war deterrent to cope with the U.S. constant threat of a nuclear war.
					
					 No one can deny that the peace and security on the Korean Peninsula have been defended by the DPRK's nuclear deterrent for self-defence.
					
					 The U.S. and its allies are kicking off a "sanctions" racket while taking issue with the DPRK over its nuclear weapons for defending the peace and security on the peninsula and in the region. This is a grave criminal act of falsifying the fact and increasing the danger of a nuclear war.
					
					 Gone are the days never to return when the U.S. could resort to high-handed practices while threatening and blackmailing the DPRK with nukes.
					
					 The U.S. is seriously mistaken if it thinks it can frighten anyone with strategic bomber and nuclear submarines.
					
					 The U.S. should know that B-52 and nuclear submarines can never get rid of the range of the DPRK's sighting strike.
					
					 It had better concern itself about its miserable fate before talking about the "fulfillment of its defense commitment".
					
					 The provocateurs of a nuclear war and aggressors are bound to meet an end in the flames of a nuclear war kindled by themselves.

articles.title: DPRK SPA Session to Be Held
articles.content:
DPRK SPA Session to Be Held 
 Pyongyang, March 21 (KCNA) -- The Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly Wednesday promulgated a decision on convening a session of the SPA. 
					 According to the decision, the 7th Session of the 12th SPA will be held in Pyongyang on April 1, Juche 102 (2013).

articles.title: Reply Message to Kim Jong Un from Xi Jinping
articles.content:
Reply Message to Kim Jong Un from Xi Jinping
						
 Pyongyang, March 21 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission, received a reply message from Xi Jinping, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, president of the People's Republic of China (PRC) and chairman of its Central Military Commission, on March 16.
					 He in the message extended thanks to Kim Jong Un for sending him congratulations on his election as president of the PRC and chairman of its  Central Military Commission, saying:
					
					 China and the DPRK are friendly neighbors.
					
					 Under the new situation I wish to join you in promoting the steady development of the Sino-DPRK traditional relations of friendship and cooperation and contributing to bringing earlier the prosperity of the two countries and peace and stability of the region.
					
					 Availing myself of this opportunity, I wish the DPRK steady, fresh successes in all affairs of the DPRK under the leadership of the WPK headed by you.
					
					 Please accept my best wishes for your country's prosperity and its people's happiness.

articles.title: Reply Message to Kim Jong Un from Lao President
articles.content:
Reply Message to Kim Jong Un from Lao President
						
 Pyongyang, March 21 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, on March 19 received a reply message from Choummaly Sayasone, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Lao People's Revolutionary Party and president of the Lao People's Democratic Republic.
					 The reply message said:
					
					 I express deep thanks to you for sending warm congratulations and best wishes to me on my 77th birthday
					
					 I am pleased that the relations of unity and cooperation between the Lao People's Democratic Republic and the DPRK based on the fraternal comradeship have steadily developed.
					
					 I hope the traditional and beautiful relations of friendship and cooperation between our two countries will grow strong from a new angle and economic relations, in particular, will develop in line with the common interests and desire of the two peoples.
					
					 I wish you good health and steady success in accomplishing your noble cause.

articles.title: Greetings to Iranian President
articles.content:
Greetings to Iranian President
 Pyongyang, March 21 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Thursday sent a message of greeting to Mahmoud Ahmadinejad, president of the Islamic Republic of Iran, on the New Year of Iran.
					 Kim in the message expressed belief that the relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries would continue to expand and develop in all fields, wishing the president, government and people of Iran greater success in the work for independent development of the country.

articles.title: Greetings to First Vice-President of Iran
articles.content:
Greetings to First Vice-President of Iran
						
 Pyongyang, March 21 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Choe Yong Rim on Thursday sent a message of greeting to Mohammad-Reza Rahimi, first vice-president of Iran, on the New Year of Iran.
					 The message sincerely wished the first vice-president of Iran good health and happiness and the Iranian people successes in their work to build a powerful and prosperous Islamic state in the New Year.
					
					 DPRK Foreign Minister Pak Ui Chun also sent a message of greeting to his Iranian counterpart Ali Akbar Salehi on the same day.

articles.title: DPRK Delegations Leave
articles.content:
DPRK Delegations Leave
 Pyongyang, March 21 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the DPRK Ministry of Foreign Affairs headed by Vice-Minister Kim Hyong Jun left here Thursday to visit African countries.
					 A delegation of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League led by Vice-Chairman of its Central Committee Jong Yong Won left here on the same day to take part in the first international preparatory meeting for the 18th World Festival of Youth and Students to be held in South Africa.

articles.title: National Seminar on Kim Jong Un's Work Held
articles.content:
National Seminar on Kim Jong Un's Work Held
						
 Pyongyang, March 21 (KCNA) -- A national seminar took place here Thursday to study and grasp the ideas and theories clarified in the concluding speech made by the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un at the 4th Conference of Cell Secretaries of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 The work, published on January 29, Juche 102 (2013), formulated great Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism as the eternal guiding idea of the WPK and the revolution clarified the ideological and theoretical issues arising in modeling whole society on Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism.
					
					 Present at the seminar were Kim Ki Nam, secretary of the WPK Central Committee, and officials of party and administrative organs, working people's organizations, scientific, educational, literary and art and media fields, institutions for training party officials and the field for the preservation of revolutionary relics.
					
					 The seminar heard papers proving the originality, scientific accuracy, truth and vitality of the ideas and theories clarified in the work.
					
					 The speakers said that the work serves as guidelines indicating the basic way for fully embodying Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, the guiding idea of the WPK.
					
					 The speakers noted: Kim Jong Un clarified the unique idea that Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism is, in essence, the people-first idea. This is his great ideological and theoretical feat as he scientifically explained the main spirit and idea of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism and put its attraction and vitality on the highest level.
					
					 He clarified the idea of closely linking broad masses with the Party with ties of kinship, thus consolidating the single-minded unity and providing guidelines for ushering in a new era.
					
					 The speakers called on all officials, party members and other people to strengthen the party's militant power in every way and bring earlier a final victory in the building of a thriving nation under the leadership of Kim Jong Un, holding aloft the banner of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism.

articles.title: Answer Given by DPRK FM Spokesman Distributed as Official Document of UNSC
articles.content:
Answer Given by DPRK FM Spokesman Distributed as Official Document of UNSC
						
 Pyongyang, March 21 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the DPRK Foreign Ministry gave an answer to the question put by KCNA on March 14 as regards the assertion made by the U.S. and its satellite forces that the Korean Armistice Agreement can never be dissolved unilaterally. Copies of this answer were distributed as an official document of the UN Security Council S/2013/162 on March 18.

articles.title: Russian Embassy Members Tour Kumsong School
articles.content:
Russian Embassy Members Tour Kumsong School
						
 Pyongyang, March 21 (KCNA) -- Ambassador Alexandr Timonin and staff members of the Russian embassy here visited Kumsong School Thursday on the occasion of the 64th anniversary of the agreement on economic and cultural cooperation between the DPRK and Russia.
					 Being briefed on the fact that students are bringing into full bloom their skills at the school, the guests looked round various classrooms and rooms for hobby groups.
					
					 They enjoyed an art performance given by students of the school and students of a school at the embassy.

articles.title: Youth Goat Farm in Hamhung Renamed DPRK-Mongolia Friendship Branch Farm
articles.content:
Youth Goat Farm in Hamhung Renamed DPRK-Mongolia Friendship Branch Farm
						
 Pyongyang, March 21 (KCNA) -- The Youth Goat Farm in Hamhung City, South Hamgyong Province of the DPRK was renamed the DPRK-Mongolia Friendship Hwangbong Branch Farm with due ceremony in the city Thursday.
					 Present there were officials of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries and other officials concerned and the ambassador and staff members of the Mongolian embassy here.
					
					 The participants laid bouquets before the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il in Hamhung City before paying tribute to them.
					
					 At the ceremony speakers referred to the significance of renaming the farm this year which marks the 25th anniversary of President Kim Il Sung's visit to Mongolia and the 65th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic ties between the DPRK and Mongolia.
					
					 They renewed their will to make continued efforts for the development of the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries.

articles.title: World Water Day Observed in DPRK
articles.content:
World Water Day Observed in DPRK
 Pyongyang, March 21 (KCNA) -- An event on the theme of "Water Cooperation" took place here Thursday on World Water Day.
					 Present there were officials of the State Planning Commission, Ministry of Public Health, Ministry of Land and Environmental Conservation, Education Commission, Grand People's Study House, etc., and the representative of UNICEF here and foreign guests.
					
					 Lectures were given there under such titles as "The success achieved in the work to solve the issue of water in the DPRK", "Water and life" and "System for using clean water."
					
					 The lecturers referred to the fact that the DPRK has paid a deep attention to supplying clean water to the people and ensuring hygienic and cultured living conditions.
					
					 They called for considering the positive development and effective use of water resources as an important issue related to the future destiny of the country and nation and taking positive measures to solve the issue.
					
					 The participants looked round photos on display.

articles.title: First Prize Goes to Kimjongilia at Int'l Flower Show
articles.content:
Top Prize Goes to Kimjongilia at Int'l Flower Show
						
 Pyongyang, March 21 (KCNA) -- The top prize went to Kimjongilia at the International Flower Show held in Ulan Bator, Mongolia from March 6 to 8.
					 Exhibited there were rare flowers from different countries including the DPRK, China and Mongolia.
					
					 The DPRK wing of the show drew an endless stream of visitors attracted by the beauty of immortal flower Kimjongilia.
					
					 The general manager of the Ed Gazhar Company, the sponsor of the show, said the show became more significant thanks to the display of the world's most famous flower Kimjongilia.
					
					 The executive chairman of the Kimjongilia Association of Mongolia said it is the wish to see Kimjongilia cultivated in various parts of the country.
					
					 Chairman of the association, son of O. Cherma who was an employee of the former Mongolian School of Korean War Orphans, said Kimjongilia is, indeed, a beautiful and rare flower, adding he is proud of having formed the association and built a glasshouse to make the immortal flower come into bloom on the land of Mongolia, true to his mother's behest.

articles.title: Insulating Refractory Products Much in Demand
articles.content:
Insulating Refractory Products Much in Demand 
						
 Pyongyang, March 21 (KCNA) -- New kinds of insulating refractory products made by the Chonnam Trading Company in the DPRK, like fire bricks, stoves and tiles, are ever growing in demand.
					 Their insulating temperature stand at from 1 200 to 1 300 degrees centigrade, compression strength 33-55kg/? and density 0.45-0.66g/?.
					
					 They are made of industrial wastes from thermal power stations and inorganic composites. 
					
					 The Heat Engineering Institute under the State Academy of Sciences and the Analytic Institute of Kim Chaek University of Technology have rebuilt an experimental high-temperature furnace by use of the kind of fire bricks, which takes only a half of electricity consumed by the existing ones.
					
					 A number of factories, including the Songyo Ceramic Factory, have rebuilt furnaces with the bricks, lowering electricity consumption 40 to 50 percent on an average.
					
					 Stoves made with the refractory materials are favored by housewives for their high efficiency.
					
					 Insulating tiles have also gained popularity among consumers.

articles.title: DPRK, Tax-free Country
articles.content:
DPRK, Tax-free Country
 Pyongyang, March 21 (KCNA) -- The Democratic People's Republic of Korea is known as a tax-free country in the world.
					 A foreign woman writer, who visited the DPRK, said she witnessed no people in the DPRK pays rent or tax, although the Western nations do not believe there is no tax in the country.
					
					 The abolition of the tax system marked a milestone in the life of the Korean people.
					
					 Thanks to President Kim Il Sung, they could realize their cherished desire to live in a tax-free country.
					
					 Earlier in the period of the anti-Japanese armed struggle, he underscored the need to abolish the tax system in the Ten-Point Programme of the Association for the Restoration of the Fatherland.
					
					 After the country's liberation from the Japanese colonial rule, he took a measure to remove all sorts of depredatory taxes and establish democratic tax system instead.
					
					 Various kinds of taxes were removed one after another, with the foundation of the self-reliant national economy laid in the country.
					
					 The system of agricultural tax in kind was entirely abolished in Juche 55 (1966), leaving income tax of workers and officers and local tax only in the country.
					
					 At the 8th Plenary Meeting of the 5th Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, Kim Il Sung took a measure to completely abolish the tax system in the country and saw to it that it was promulgated as an ordinance at the Supreme People's Assembly on March 21, 1974.
					
					 Thus, the DPRK has become a tax-free country for the first time in the world.

articles.title: U.S. Deployment of More Interceptor Missiles Is Stop-Gap Measure: News Analyst
articles.content:
U.S. Deployment of More Interceptor Missiles Is Stop-Gap Measure: News Analyst
						
 Pyongyang, March 21 (KCNA) -- The U.S. is now running helter-skelter.
					 The U.S. Defense Department announced on March 15 that it would deploy 14 more interceptor missiles in Alaska, California and the areas of the west coast. This will bring the number of interceptor missiles to 44 from the current 30.
					
					 The Department also announced its cancellation of the plan for fourth-stage missile defence system in Europe and agreed to install the second radar station in Japan and look into the proposal for building the third tunnel-type interceptor missile base in the U.S.
					
					 Explaining it, U.S. Defense Secretary Hagel said it was because north Korea's long-range missile technology is developing.
					
					 The world is now looking at the recent steps taken by the U.S. with dubious eyes.
					
					 On March 13 U.S. President Obama, when interviewed by a reporter, said north Korea may not have capabilities for attacking the U.S. mainland and Commander of U.S. Strategic Command Keller made a bluster at a Senate Armed Services Committee hearing that if north Korea comes in attack targeting the U.S. mainland, the U.S. can certainly defend the country with 30 interceptor missiles now in stock.
					
					 In the past the U.S. misled the public opinion, arguing pros and cons regarding the DPRK's capability of missile attack.
					
					 On one hand, it downplayed the DPRK's capabilities, saying that Pyongyang has not yet developed inter-continental ballistic missiles capable of striking the continental U.S. It, on the other hand, spread the story of "missile threats from north Korea", taking it as a pretext for building missile shields in Asia and the rest of the world.
					
					 But the DPRK's firm will to make showdown with the U.S. has stunned it.
					
					 It was astonished at the declaration made by the DPRK in the serious terms that the army and people of the country are on a high alert with nuclear weapons, inter-continental ballistic missiles and other attack means already in place targeting the U.S. 
					
					 The U.S. could no longer downplay the might of the DPRK.
					
					 It was put in hot water in the face of the imminent shower of bullets and shells to be unleashed by the DPRK on its land.
					
					 The U.S. kicked off even a nuclear war rehearsal after tightening "sanctions" and pressure on the DPRK over its legitimate satellite launch for peaceful purposes and the measure for self-defence. The U.S. is now caught in its own snare.
					
					 It is foolish for the U.S. to think it can guarantee the security of its mainland by just deploying more interceptor missiles as a stop-gap emergency measure.
					
					 No one can vouch that the U.S. can intercept all nuclear missiles of the DPRK that will be hailed on its mainland.
					
					 The interceptor missile measure of the U.S. just reveals its restlessness. The DPRK's striking power is limitless and will destroy all the strongholds and bases of aggression.
					
					  The only way for the U.S. to guarantee the security of its mainland is to renounce its hostile policy toward the DPRK before the latter pushes the launch button.

articles.title: UN Security Council, Imperialists' Tool for High-handed, Arbitrary Practices (3): News Analyst
articles.content:
UN Security Council, Imperialists' Tool for High-handed, Arbitrary Practices (3): News Analyst
 Pyongyang, March 21 (KCNA) -- During the Libyan crisis in 2011 Western countries prodded the UN Security Council into adopting a resolution on setting no-flying zone in Libya under the pretext of "protecting civilians."
					 Warplanes of the Western countries lost no time to make massive air raids on Libya.
					
					 The international community censured the air raids, claiming they went beyond the mandate granted by the UNSC's resolution, but it was too late.
					
					 The barbarous air raids left a large number of civilians killed and caused many refugees. They reduced urban and rural areas of Libya to debris.
					
					 Chinese Xinhua News said that the West's military operation against Libya was conducted under the signboard of "humanitarianism," but, on the contrary, it resulted in human disasters.
					
					 As all facts prove, all plots hatched by the imperialists through the abuse of the UNSC are bound to be followed by a war of aggression and it is certain to lead to massacre, destruction and national misery and ruin.
					
					 When the crow flies, her tail follows.
					
					 A series of "resolutions on sanctions" the U.S. imperialists and their allies cook up against the DPRK over its legitimate satellite launch and just measures for self-defence to cope with their hostile acts cannot be construed otherwise than a curtain raiser to a war.
					
					 That was why Songun Korea regarding its sovereignty as life and soul vehemently denounced the UNSC's "resolutions" against it as an open declaration of war because they were products of the imperialists' plots and launched an all-out action against them.
					
					 The Korean people still remember all crimes committed by the U.S. imperialists after provoking the Korean War in the 1950s and prodding the UNSC into bringing imperialist mercenaries under the berets of "UN forces" to the inviolable territory of Korea.
					
					 They committed such thrice-cursed crimes as bringing war disasters to the peace-loving nation and wantonly infringing upon the sovereign state's dignity, sovereignty and territorial integrity. No statute of limitation is applicable to these crimes and their perpetrators are fated to face a merciless punishment.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK want peace, but are never afraid of war.
					
					 It is the unanimous view of military analysts that if a war breaks out in Korea, it will lead to a global thermonuclear war and its consequences will be unpredictably disastrous. 
					
					  Songun Korea today is no longer what it used to be as in the 1950s when it was just a young Republic.
					
					 Should the U.S. imperialists dare make even a slight provocation, the great Paektusan nation with matchless military power will never miss the chance to blow up the strongholds for aggression and reunify the country without fail.

articles.title: Yaoyinggou Meeting Significant in Anti-Japanese Armed Struggle
articles.content:
Yaoyinggou Meeting Significant in Anti-Japanese Armed Struggle
						
 Pyongyang, March 21 (KCNA) -- The Yaoyinggou meeting convened by President Kim Il Sung on March 21-27, Juche 24 (1935) marked a milestone in the anti-Japanese armed struggle conducted by the Korean People's Revolutionary Army (KPRA), which was under his command.
					 Yaoyinggou in Wangqing County of China was where the KPRA headquarters was located in the first half of the 1930s.
					
					 At that time, the Japanese aggressors were frantic in "punitive" offensives against guerrilla zones.
					
					 They forced residents to live in "internment villages" and tightened the "collective watch system" in a bid to leave guerrilla zones isolated completely from communities, while launching "surrender campaign" to undermine the revolutionary ranks.
					
					 To cope with the situation, Kim Il Sung at the meeting of KPRA military and political cadres set forth a new line of relinquishing the guerrilla zones and launching operations of large units in wide areas.
					
					 The line was a justifiable one which made it possible to turn adversity into favorable condition.
					
					 The validity of the line was clearly proved in the ensuing KPRA's anti-Japanese armed struggle and the Korean revolution as a whole.
					
					 After the Yaoyinggou meeting, the KPRA expanded the armed struggle in vast areas in the homeland and Manchuria to overshadow the enemy's numerical and technical superiorities, frustrating its attempt to stifle the KPRA units.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Learning from Kim Il Sung's and Kim Jong Il's Noble Outlook on People
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Learning from Kim Il Sung's and Kim Jong Il's Noble Outlook on People
  Pyongyang, March 21 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung's and leader Kim Jong Il's noble outlook on the people is an example to be followed by the officials, says Rodong Sinmun Thursday in a bylined article.
					 It goes on:
					
					 Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, regarding it as their maxim to believe in the people as in Heaven, made ceaseless journeys for field guidance all their lives for their happiness.
					
					 It was their creed that if the people wish, it is necessary to pluck even a star from the sky and bring a flower into bloom on a rock. The peerlessly great men's patriotic devotion brought joy and happiness to the people and there appeared a legendary epic on their love for the people.   
					
					 Only when officials believe in the people as in Heaven, bearing in mind Kim Il Sung's and Kim Jong Il's outlook on the people, can they become true servants for the people who travel at night and carry a heavier burden on their backs than others for the improvement of the people's living standard.
					
					 It is the firm determination of the Workers' Party of Korea to respect the people and devote itself to them as it holds Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il in high esteem.
					
					  Officials should always bear in mind the party's intention and live and work in the spirit of love and trust in the people.
					
					 When they believe in the people as in Heaven and work hard for them, it is possible to radically improve the people's living standard.
					
					 Production will be reenergized and people's living standard improved only when there are more officials who keep creating something new with great ambition and ideal and more pioneers and forerunners who bring about bold innovations free from fixed framework.
					
					 Only when all officials give spurs to the work at their units with creative ingenuity and innovative view, is it possible to make the material and technological foundation for improving the people's living standard associated with the efforts made by Kim Jong Il all his life substantially pay off, and bring more benefits to  the people's living.

articles.title: No One Can Break DPRK's Will to Protect Its Sovereignty: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
No One Can Break DPRK's Will to Protect Its Sovereignty: Rodong Sinmun
						
 Pyongyang, March 21 (KCNA) -- Unshakable are the stand and will of all service personnel and people of the DPRK to sweep away aggressors, provokers from this land and achieve a final victory in the sacred war for national reunification.
					 Rodong Sinmun Thursday says this in a bylined article.
					
					 The strong countermeasures taken by the DPRK to defend its sovereignty are a manifestation of the firm will of its army and people to protect the country and socialism at the cost of their lives from all sorts of aggression moves of hostile forces, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 The service personnel and people of the DPRK always remember the bitter history of the nation in the last century when Koreans were subject to colonial slavery.
					
					 The DPRK has bolstered up in every way its deterrence for self-defence while tightening belt to cope with the escalating nuclear threat of the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet forces. It laid a sure guarantee for defending its sovereignty under the uplifted banner of Songun as it can never allow its people to become slaves of the imperialists again.
					
					 Its army and people have never thought of any concession and compromise in the struggle to defend its sovereignty.
					
					 Its strong countermeasures are a choice not for threatening anyone but for protecting the dignity and sovereignty of the country and nation.
					
					 The moment the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean warmongers ignite a nuclear war will be a historic moment heralding the overall start of the army and people's all-out struggle for national reunification. The right to preemptive nuclear attack is not a monopoly of the U.S.
					
					 The DPRK does what it is determined to do. Whether the U.S. and the south Korean warmongers will experience or not the nightmare in which they will realize its will amid screams, while meeting a miserable death, entirely depends on their attitude.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Accuses U.S. of Escalating Tension on Korean Peninsula
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Accuses U.S. of Escalating Tension on Korean Peninsula
						
 Pyongyang, March 21 (KCNA) -- Different countries and forces of the world have launched more than 9 000 satellites and conducted at least 2 000 nuclear tests but their acts did not push the situation in relevant regions to the brink of a war.
					 Rodong Sinmun Thursday says this in a bylined article.
					
					 The fact goes to prove that satellite launch and nuclear test for self-defence are not a major factor of escalating tension and provoking a war, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 However, the situation on the Korean Peninsula is quite different from what is happening in other regions. Whenever the DPRK launches a satellite and takes a just measure for self-defence, the situation on the Korean Peninsula is driven to the phase of a war, occasioned by them. 
					
					 All this is entirely attributable to the U.S.
					
					 The aim sought by the U.S. in escalating the tension on the Korean Peninsula to an extreme phase is to create favorable environment for establishing hegemony over the Asia-Pacific.
					
					 Escalating the tension on the peninsula in a crafty and premeditated manner, the U.S. has created conditions for ensuring the permanent presence of the U.S. troops and bolstering up its military capacity to lay a siege to big powers in the Asia-Pacific.
					
					 It seeks to tide over its economic crisis by unleashing another Korean war.
					
					 Even if the DPRK does not launch a satellite and conduct a nuclear test, the U.S. will remain unchanged in its wild ambition to dominate the Asia-Pacific region. The stronger position of the DPRK as a nuclear weapons state would put a brake on the U.S. efforts to realize its ambition to dominate the Asia-Pacific region and help protect peace and stability in the region.
					
					 The DPRK will keep taking measures to bolster up its deterrence to cope with the U.S. imperialists' reckless moves for a new war, concludes the article.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Warns U.S., S. Korea against Foolish Adventure
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Warns U.S., S. Korea against Foolish Adventure
						
 Pyongyang, March 21 (KCNA) -- The U.S. imperialists sent B-52 strategic bomber to the Korean Peninsula on March 8 and 19 to stage bombing drills in the sky above south Korean Kangwon Province.
					 Earlier, U.S. Deputy Defense Secretary Carter came to south Korea to discuss with Defense Minister Kim Kwan Jin joint counteractions to cope with "threats" from the DPRK. He said B-52 will be hurled to the joint military exercises to "show off will" and be made to continue such flights.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Thursday says in a bylined commentary this reveals the seriously grave phase the U.S. and the south Korean warmongers have reached in their moves to mount a preemptive nuclear attack on the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. strategic nuclear strike means came to the Korean Peninsula for an actual war exercise, a clear proof that the nuclear war threats posed by the warmongers to the DPRK are becoming a reality, the news analyst says, and goes on:
					
					 As proven by B-52's bombing drills, the U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces are chieftains escalating tension and the danger of a nuclear war and harassing peace on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 It is ludicrous for the warmongers to try to browbeat the DPRK by opening to public the series of sorties made by B-52 while speaking loudly of "joint counteractions" and "showing-off of will". If the U.S. truly attempts at a preemptive nuclear attack on the DPRK, the latter will mercilessly counter it with precision nuclear strike means that have been diversified.
					
					 The U.S. and the south Korean warmongers should clearly remember that the Korean Armistice Agreement was nullified from March 11.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists and the south Korean warmongers should not make foolish adventure of testing the will of the army and people of the DPRK to fight a dueling battle. That will lead them to a final ruin.

articles.title: U.S. B-52 Bomber's Flight to Korean Peninsula Slammed: KCNA Commentary
articles.content:
U.S. B-52 Bomber's Flight to Korean Peninsula Slammed: KCNA Commentary 
						
 Pyongyang, March 21 (KCNA) -- The U.S.-south Korea joint military drills codenamed Key Resolve and Foal Eagle are assuming increasing danger of a nuclear war.
					 B-52, a prototype strategic bomber of the U.S. air force, flew to the sky above south Korea on March 8 and 19 for bombing drills.
					
					 B-52 has been regarded as one of three major nuclear attack means for the U.S. along with inter-continental ballistic missile and submarine launching missile that are based in the U.S. mainland.
					
					 The flights of the strategic bomber to Korea for the Key Resolve and Foal Eagle clearly prove the aggressive and adventurous nature of the drills as a test nuclear war rehearsal.
					
					 A spokesman for the U.S. Defense Department said that B-52's nuclear and conventional capabilities will be tested in the on-going drills.
					
					 Hurled into the drills are huge ground, marine and air nuclear strike means including the U.S. nuclear carrier flotilla and strategic bombers armed with nuclear warheads.
					
					 Nuclear-powered submarines equipped with nuclear missiles are also reported to take part in the drills.
					
					 The introduction of strategic nuclear strike means into the Korean Peninsula amid the situation inching close to a war is an intolerable challenge aimed to test the declaration of the DPRK that it will take toughest stand.
					
					 The U.S. held joint exercises with the involvement of B-52 and nuclear submarines in the past which had been kept secret.
					
					 Now exceptionally making public the flight plan of B- 52, the U.S. is confirming its offer of a "nuclear umbrella" to south Korea, an open nuclear threat to the DPRK. This is also a revelation of its reckless attempt to ignite a new nuclear war against the DPRK by escalating the tension.
					
					 Never has there created such an acute nuke-to-nuke showdown on the Korean Peninsula as today.
					
					 Any slightest act of getting on the nerves of the other party is extremely dangerous on the Korean Peninsula now as a flash of fire may lead to a total war.
					
					 However, the U.S. is stepping up the military pressure on the DPRK, staging large-scale nuclear war exercises against it and openly introducing strategic nuclear armed forces into south Korea every year.
					
					 Before the Key Resolve and Foal Eagle, the U.S. staged a drill for preempting a nuclear strike at the DPRK in the East Sea of Korea, citing the measures for self-defence taken by it to cope with the UN Security Council's shameless "resolutions on sanctions" against it.
					
					 All developments prove once again that the U.S. imperialists remain unchanged in their nuclear policy to violate the sovereignty and dignity of the DPRK and that it was just when it chose to react to the gangsters' nukes with nukes of justice.
					
					 The U.S. is now insulting and challenging the DPRK's nuclear deterrence for self-defence to test its patience. The U.S. should not expect mercy from the DPRK.
					
					 The DPRK's revolutionary armed forces equipped with powerful militant capacity are full of spirit of annihilating enemies to the last man by taking thousand-fold retaliations against those who provoke the independent dignity and security of the country even a bit.
					
					 If the U.S. sends B-52 to Korea again, it will meet catastrophic end by the strong military counteraction of the DPRK.
					
					 Time has gone when words worked.

articles.title: U.S., S. Korean Warmongers Busy with Anti-DPRK Naval Maneuvers
articles.content:
U.S., S. Korean Warmongers Busy with Anti-DPRK Naval Maneuvers 
						
 Pyongyang, March 21 (KCNA) -- The U.S. imperialists and south Korean warmongers are busy with madcap combined naval maneuvers in waters of the East, West and South Seas of Korea as part of the Foal Eagle joint war drills against the DPRK.
					 Four Aegis ships including John S. McCain of the U.S. imperialist aggression forces and nearly 30 warships of the south Korean navy including destroyers, patrol craft, logistic support craft and submarines have been busy kicking up war hysteria in waters off the Korean Peninsula since March 13.
					
					 Cheyenne, a nuclear submarine belonging to the U.S. 7th Fleet equipped with vertical launch cruise missiles and sophisticated system is also involved in the drills.
					
					 It arrived at Pusan Port on Wednesday while the maneuvers were under way.
					
					 The combined naval drills including marine interception, firing, missile monitoring and anti-submarine exercises will reportedly go on till March 23. 
					
					 The on-going saber-rattling is obviously a nuclear war exercise aimed at a preemptive attack on the DPRK.

articles.title: Halt to Large-scale Joint Military Exercises Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Halt to Large-scale Joint Military Exercises Demanded in S. Korea
						
 Pyongyang, March 21 (KCNA) -- The Academic Headquarters of the South Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration issued a statement on March 16 as regards the military tension escalating on the Korean Peninsula.
					 A tough-and-go situation is being created on the peninsula due to the U.S.-south Korea joint military exercises, the statement said.
					
					 It demanded the U.S. and south Korean authorities stop at once the large-scale joint military exercises that are behind the prevailing serious situation and immediately roll back the policy for confrontation with the north pursued by the Lee Myung Bak regime for five years of its office.
					
					 The U.S. was the first to break the promise of improving the relations with the north, and it is the U.S. which led the UN bid for approving a "resolution on sanctions" against the north over the successful nuclear test for self-defense, the statement held.
					
					 It urged the U.S. to lift its decades-old blockade and "sanctions" against the north and opt for dialogue with it.

articles.title: Withdrawal of U.S. Forces Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Withdrawal of U.S. Forces Demanded in S. Korea
						
 Pyongyang, March 21 (KCNA) -- Members of civic and public organizations in south Korea demanded the withdrawal of the U.S. forces from south Korea as regards the GIs crimes occurring one after another.
					 Yu Yong Jae, member of the People for Achieving Peace and Reunification, deplored the situation in which south Koreans' life, property and security are threatened by the GIs crimes.
					
					 He condemned GIs for assaulting inhabitants and policemen and driving cars over them.
					
					 The ceaseless GIs crimes are attributable to the shackling U.S.-south Korea "Status of Forces Agreement" (SOFA), he said, accusing the south Korean authorities of not punishing the criminals, reading the U.S. face. 
					
					 He called upon civic and public organizations to turn out in actions to prevent GIs crimes and protect the people's rights.
					
					 Kwon O Hon, honorary chairman of the Association for Supporting Prisoners of Conscience of the Family Movement for Realizing Democracy, said that GIs crimes have been committed since the U.S. forces occupied south Korea.
					
					 The basic way of preventing GIs crimes is not to revise the SOFA but have the U.S. forces withdrawn from south Korea, he noted.
					
					 The U.S. forces should be withdrawn from south Korea at an early date as they are perpetrating all evils and crimes and only bringing misfortune to the Korean nation, he stressed.

articles.title: Action for Peace against War Called for in S. Korea
articles.content:
Action for Peace against War Called for in S. Korea
						
 Pyongyang, March 21 (KCNA) -- The Joint Action for Peace against War in south Korea continued a sit-in strike on March 15 to oppose the joint military exercises of the U.S. imperialists and south Korean warmongers.
					 The participants in the strike warned that if the U.S., which brought pain and disasters of division to the Korean nation, blocks independent reunification and peace, it will be held wholly responsible for the ensuing consequences.
					
					 They noted they would continue the action for peace against war, not slackening keyed-up attitude till the end of the joint military exercises.
					
					 They can not hand over their suffering to posterity, they said, calling upon people of different social standings to raise the voices for peace against war.

articles.title: Action for Realizing Peace on Korean Peninsula Declared in S. Korea
articles.content:
Action for Realizing Peace on Korean Peninsula Declared in S. Korea
						
 Pyongyang, March 21 (KCNA) -- Elders of the reunification movement in Pusan, south Korea held an emergency press conference in Pusan on March 18 to denounce the north-targeted joint military exercises of the U.S. and south Korean warmongers.
					 At the press conference speakers said the danger of war is increasing on the Korean Peninsula due to the Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises.
					
					 The situation on the peninsula reached an inch away from a war after the bluster of the south Korean military that it would not rule out a war, they noted.
					
					 The hard-line policy and military pressure on the north will only fuel a crisis, not settling the issue, they said, demanding an immediate halt to the joint military war maneuvers that get on the nerves of the north.
					
					 They urged the south Korean authorities to build confidence with the north by implementing the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration.
					
					 They said that they would, together with organizations of different social strata in Pusan, conduct an action for peace against war on the Korean Peninsula.

articles.title: Candlelight Rally against War Maneuvers Held in S. Korea
articles.content:
Candlelight Rally against War Maneuvers Held in S. Korea
						
 Pyongyang, March 21 (KCNA) -- Members of civic and public organizations of south Korea including the Solidarity for Progress and the People's Strength for Building New World held a candlelight rally in Seoul on March 16 to oppose the joint military exercises of the U.S. imperialists  and south Korean puppet forces.
					 At the rally speakers denounced the "government" authorities for terming those wanting to live in peace against war "followers of the north".
					
					 Peace is a desire of all Koreans, they noted.
					
					 We can never tolerate a war which will bring benefits only to the U.S. munitions monopolistic capital, they held.
					
					 They called for showing children who do not know about a war how to keep the promise made to the nation -- June 15 joint declaration -- and carry it out to defend peace.
					
					 They also called for bringing earlier the day when Koreans will live in a reunified land free from war.

articles.title: More GIs Crimes Occur in S. Korea
articles.content:
More GIs Crimes Occur in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, March 21 (KCNA) -- GIs crimes are occurring in south Korea one after another, according to the south Korean newspaper Hangyore.
					 A drunken GI of the U.S. military base in Tongduchon, Kyonggi Province assaulted a south Korean policeman in Sogyo-dong, Mapho District, Seoul at the dawn of March 17. 
					
					 Another GI based in Songnam, Kyonggi Province picked a quarrel with a south Korean passer-by in Seoul on the same day, making a much ado. He assaulted a south Korean policeman and gave a damage to a building.
					
					 These criminals were transferred to the U.S. forces side, unpunished.
					
					 In this regard south Koreans are strongly protesting against GIs, saying "GIs act with no fear" and "U.S. forces should be called to account for not taking any measure to prevent recurrence".

articles.title: Koreans in China Call for Countering Nukes in Kind
articles.content:
Koreans in China Call for Countering Nukes in Kind
						
 Pyongyang, March 21 (KCNA) -- The Jilin Regional Association of the General Association of Koreans in China made public a statement "Those brandishing nuclear stick should be met with nukes" on March 14.
					 The statement accused the U.S. and other hostile forces displeased with the DPRK's satellite launch for peaceful purposes of working hard to isolate and stifle the DPRK.
					
					 The successful nuclear test conducted by the DPRK was a just measure for self-defence and a great coup in the nation's history which proved that the U.S. imperialists threatening and blackmailing the independent people with a nuclear stick and resorting to high-handed and arbitrary practices should be countered with nukes, it said, adding:
					
					 Even now the U.S. and the south Korean warmongers are staging madcap large-scale Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises.
					
					 We strongly condemn the dangerous DPRK-targeted war drills being staged by the warmongers after putting the DPRK on the list of preemptive nuclear attack.

articles.title: Koreans in China Declare Action against U.S. Anti-DPRK War Moves
articles.content:
Koreans in China Declare Action against U.S. Anti-DPRK War Moves 
						
 Pyongyang, March 21 (KCNA) -- The Zhongnan Regional Association of the General Association of Koreans in China made public a statement on March 18 in support of an "appeal to the whole Korean nation" issued by the Central Committee of the Democratic Front of the Reunification of Korea.
					 The statement said today's all-out action is one of the whole Korean nation to defend its dignity and sovereignty against the U.S.
					
					 It called upon the whole nation to more vigorously come out to action in order to drive the U.S. aggression forces, the root cause of all miseries, pain and war, out of south Korea.
					
					 It added that all the members of the Zhongnan Regional Association of the General Association of Koreans in China will pull efforts for the nation-wide patriotic sacred war, fulfilling their noble mission and historic responsibility as members of the nation.

articles.title: Protest Lodged with U.S., S. Korean Chief Executives
articles.content:
Protest Lodged with U.S., S. Korean Chief Executives 
						
 Pyongyang, March 21 (KCNA) -- The Autonomous Society of Korean National Culture in Partizansk, Russia and the Partizansk City Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation on March 13 sent a letter of protest to the chief executives of the U.S. and south Korea in their joint name.
					 The letter said that Partizansk, Maritime Territory of the Russian Federation is greatly concerned over the tension on the Korean Peninsula escalating due to the interference of the U.S. forces and the "UN Command".
					
					 It called upon all countries in the Asia-Pacific region to make persistent efforts for the reunification of the north and the south of Korea for the prosperity and stability of its people and thus contribute to ensuring peace on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 It urged the U.S. and south Korean authorities to come out without delay for substantial actions for the reunification of Korea.

articles.title: Statement of KPA Supreme Command Spokesman Supported by Int'l Organization
articles.content:
Statement of KPA Supreme Command Spokesman Supported by Int'l Organization 
 Pyongyang, March 21 (KCNA) -- Alejandro Cao de Benos, chairman of the Korean Friendship Association headquartered in Spain, in a statement on March 12 expressed full support to the statement issued by a spokesman for the Supreme Command of the Korean People's Army (KPA).
					 The chairman said in the statement:
					
					 The statement issued by a spokesman for the KPA Supreme Command meant a just measure taken by the DPRK to defend its dignity and sovereignty.
					
					 The imperialists should bear in mind that Juche Korea would defend its political faith and territory to the end, not yielding to any aggression.
					
					 The Korean Friendship Association readily accepted the desire of the world progressive people to join the KPA defending the country as international volunteers.
					
					 The arrogant U.S. and its servants will be sent to the bottom of the sea in flames and their miserable defeat will always remain recorded in history.
					
					 We are firmly convinced that the Korean people will emerge victorious thanks to their own will and strength under the leadership of the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Imperialists' Aggression Moves against DPRK under Fire
articles.content:
Imperialists' Aggression Moves against DPRK under Fire
						
 Pyongyang, March 21 (KCNA) -- A French political party and a Russian organization denounced the dangerous moves of the U.S. and its allies to invade the DPRK.
					 The French Revolutionary Communist League stated on March 13:
					
					 Permanent member states of the UN Security Council which cooked up a "resolution" against the DPRK over its nuclear test to defend its sovereignty are the countries which conducted many nuclear tests and launched lots of satellites.
					
					 They adopted "the resolution on sanctions" against independent socialist Korea though they conduct nuclear tests and launched satellites as they pleased for world domination. This is the height of double-standards.
					
					 The U.S. is the arch criminal bringing the danger of a nuclear war to the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 The French Revolutionary Communist League extends firm solidarity to the Korean people who turned out in an all-out action to defend the sovereignty and dignity and achieve national reunification under the leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The U.S. should stop the war moves against the DPRK at once.
					
					 The Maritime Territorial Committee of the Russian Youth League in a statement on March 14 expressed full support to the Korean people in their struggle for frustrating the aggressive moves of the U.S. and its allies.
					
					 The statement stressed that the DPRK would deal deadly blows at the aggressors under the leadership of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: War Moves of U.S. and S. Korea under Fire
articles.content:
War Moves of U.S. and S. Korea under Fire 
						
 Pyongyang, March 21 (KCNA) -- A Bulgarian political party and a Nigerian organization released statements on March 9 and 12 to denounce the reckless moves of the U.S. and south Korean authorities to provoke a new war.
					 The Bulgarian Communists League said:
					
					 We support all the measures taken by the DPRK to defend the sovereignty from the U.S. aggression and bring peace and security to the Korean Peninsula and the region.
					
					 The Korean people will achieve a final victory in the confrontation with the U.S. imperialists under the leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The Bulgarian Communists League will stand by the side of the Korean people.
					
					 The Nigeria-Korea Friendship Association noted that the accusation made against the DPRK's satellite launch for peaceful purposes was an act of deliberately disturbing peace in the region.
					
					 The Association went on:
					
					 The U.S. and its allies are staging large-scale joint military exercises in south Korea with even nuclear strike means involved to threaten the Korean people.
					
					 Under the situation the Supreme Command of the Korean People's Army (KPA) declared that it would take stronger practical countermeasures in succession and make the Korean Armistice Agreement totally nullified.
					
					 We recognize the statement issued by a spokesman for the Supreme Command of the KPA as a just one for defending the sovereignty, dignity and supreme interests of the country and nation and fully support the statement.
					
					 The hostile forces should not forget that the DPRK has nuclear weapons.
					
					 The DPRK does whatever it is determined to do. The war maniacs should bear in mind that they will suffer a terrible disaster if they go reckless, oblivious of its mettle.

articles.title: Newspaper of Jordan on Korean Armistice Agreement
articles.content:
Newspaper of Jordan on Korean Armistice Agreement
						
 Pyongyang, March 21 (KCNA) -- The Jordanian newspaper Al Diyar on March 10 carried an article supporting the DPRK's stand for defending the sovereignty.
					 The paper said:
					
					 Why was the Korean Armistice Agreement (AA) nullified?
					
					 It was attributable to the U.S. and south Korean authorities.
					
					 The U.S. covered the whole area of south Korea with nuclear weapons and weapons of mass destruction after the Korean War.
					
					 The U.S. administration, however, goes so impudent as to talk about the "threat from the north".
					
					 The U.S. tries to rule the world in its own interests, being engaged in high-handed and arbitrary practices.
					
					 Humankind should clearly know the U.S. forces' illegal presence in south Korea and the U.S. wild ambition in the Korean Peninsula and Northeast Asia.
					
					 The DPRK declared its stand to take stronger countermeasures to cope with the UN Security Council's "resolution".
					
					 The spokesman for the DPRK Foreign Ministry in a statement clarified that the world will clearly see how the DPRK maintains its status as a nuclear weapons state and satellite launching state in reaction to the U.S. attitude of prodding the UN Security Council into cooking up the "resolution on sanctions" against the DPRK.
					
					 The DPRK has the right to defend it from the moves of the U.S. to stifle it.
					
					 Self-defence is an inviolable right which allows no bargaining. It should not be weakened nor be entrusted to other country.
					
					 It was not right for the UN Security Council to adopt the "resolution" against the DPRK.
					
					 The UNSC should not become a tool legalizing the aggression moves of the U.S.
					
					 The DPRK branded the UNSC as a stooge of the U.S.
					
					 If the U.S. sincerely hopes for peace in the world, it should scrap its nuclear weapons.
					
					  The DPRK warned that settling accounts with the U.S. needs to be done with force, not with words as it regards the jungle law as the rule of its survival.

articles.title: Peruvian Political Parties, Organizations Reject UN "Resolution" against DPRK
articles.content:
Peruvian Political Parties, Organizations Reject UN "Resolution" against DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, March 21 (KCNA) -- 16 political parties and organizations of Peru including the Communist Party of Peru "Red Motherland", the General Kim Jong Il Peruvian Amicable Institute and the Peruvian-Korean Institute of Culture and Friendship released a joint statement on March 12 in protest against the UN "resolution on sanctions" against the DPRK.
					 The statement said:
					
					 It is natural for all countries to have weapons for self-defence to defend their people from aggression of the hostile forces.
					
					 The DPRK has made every possible effort to defend peace and stability on the Korean Peninsula to cope with the entirely unreasonable "resolution" adopted by the UN Security Council.
					
					 However, the U.S. is staging the Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises, posing a constant threat to the peace-loving Korean people. 
					
					 The DPRK is left with no option but to take the toughest countermeasures to defuse the threat of enemies and defend the sovereignty of the country under the prevailing grave situation.
					
					 The "resolution on sanctions" cooked up by the UNSC at the prodding of the U.S. will only compel the DPRK to take stronger second and third countermeasures much earlier than expected.
					
					 The UNSC touched off the unbearable grudge of the Korean nation by playing the role of a servant for the U.S. in its war of aggression in 1950. It should take issue with the U.S. nuclear war maneuvers to invade the DPRK, dismantle the "UN Command" at once and take measures to defuse the tension on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 We fully support the measures taken by the DPRK to cope with the moves of the U.S. and its stooges for aggression and extend solidarity to the peace-loving Korean people.

articles.title: Foreign Organizations Censure U.S.-S. Korea Nuclear War Maneuvers
articles.content:
Foreign Organizations Censure U.S.-S. Korea Nuclear War Maneuvers
						
  Pyongyang, March 21 (KCNA) -- Organizations of Democratic Congo and Moldova urged the U.S. and south Korea to stop their rash acts.
					 The Democratic Congo-Korea Friendship and Solidarity Association in a statement on March 10 accused the U.S. and its allies of running amuck to stifle the DPRK, bulwark of socialism.
					
					 The statement went on:
					
					 We hail the DPRK's successful third underground nuclear test conducted to cope with the moves of the U.S. and its allies to stifle the DPRK over its satellite launch for peaceful purposes.
					
					 We vehemently condemn the provocative Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises of the U.S. and south Korean warmongers on behalf of the world peace-loving people.
					
					 The U.S. and south Korean authorities had better stop acting recklessly, bearing in mind that the patience of the army and people of the DPRK has a limit.
					
					 We urge the U.S. to roll back its anachronistic hostile policy towards the DPRK and withdraw its aggressor troops from south Korea at once.
					
					 We call on the world peace-loving people to pool efforts and hold in check the U.S. moves to ignite a war and positively support the Korean people in their just cause.
					
					 The Anti-Imperialist Association of Songun Revolution for the Study of the Juche Idea in Moldova in a statement on the same day expressed admiration at the decisive and firm stand of the DPRK. 
					
					 It expressed the belief that the army and people of the DPRK would surely emerge victorious under the wise leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Nepali, Ecuadorian Organizations Denounce Anti-DPRK Moves of U.S., Its Allies
articles.content:
Nepali, Ecuadorian Organizations Denounce Anti-DPRK Moves of U.S., Its Allies
						
 Pyongyang, March 21 (KCNA) -- Organizations of Nepal and Ecuador issued statements on March 12 and 13 in denunciation of the anti-DPRK moves of the U.S. and its allies.
					 The Nepalese Association for Supporting the Songun Politics denounced the on-going joint military drills of the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet army as very dangerous ones for stifling the DPRK and igniting a new war of aggression in Korea. It went on:
					
					 The U.S. and its allies are accusing the DPRK of its underground nuclear test conducted to safeguard the country's sovereignty and desperately stepping up the hostile moves against it. Such moves are a wanton violation of justice.
					
					 It is very unfair that the UN Security Council kicked up a "sanctions" racket only against the DPRK's satellite launch and nuclear test while keeping mum about other countries' satellite launches and nuclear tests.
					
					 We urge the UNSC to withdraw such "resolutions on sanctions" and demand the U.S. and south Korean bellicose forces stop at once the war drills for aggression straining the situation on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 The U.S. should withdraw its aggressor forces from south Korea at once.
					
					 We extend firm support to the Korean people in their struggle for safeguarding the country's sovereignty and achieving national reunification.
					
					 The Ecuador-Guaranda Institute for Friendship and Cultural Solidarity with the Korean People said such grave situation on the Korean Peninsula created by the U.S. and its lackeys opposed to peaceful coexistence of humankind is arousing great concern of the international community.
					
					 The association called on all the progressive forces to unite as one and extend solidarity to the Korean people in their struggle against imperialism and the U.S.

articles.title: DPRK's Measures to Bolster Its Military Capability Supported by Nepalese Paper
articles.content:
DPRK's Measures to Bolster Its Military Capability Supported by Nepalese Paper
 Pyongyang, March 21 (KCNA) -- The Nepalese paper Majodur on Mar. 10 carried an article titled "'Sanctions against the DPRK over its nuclear deterrence."
					 The UN Security Council adopted another "resolution on sanctions" against the DPRK, the paper said, adding:
					
					 The high-handed hostile policy of the U.S. compelled the DPRK to conduct a nuclear test.
					
					 As the DPRK claimed, the U.S. hostile policy and sanctions against it compelled the former to have access to nuclear weapons.
					
					 The imperialists floated the story that the DPRK's launch of a satellite was the "launch of a ballistic missile for nuclear strike," leading the situation to the adoption of a "resolution on sanctions."
					
					 If necessary, the DPRK can use a carrier rocket as a ballistic missile for defending its sovereignty.
					
					 For this reason, the U.S.-led imperialist states got nervous and voiced objection against the satellite launch of the DPRK as they consider technology for satellite launch as their monopoly and a tool for aggression.
					
					 Unceasing war threat and acute situation compelled the DPRK to have access to nuclear deterrence and pursue Songun politics which calls for giving priority to military affairs.
					
					 But for the pressure and threat on the part of the U.S.-led imperialist forces, the DPRK would have diverted the funds needed for augmenting the military capability to improving the people's living standard and developing the economy, emerging the most developed country in the world.
					
					 It was an entirely just option for the DPRK to have bolstered up its military muscle by pursuing Songun politics under the prevailing situation.

articles.title: DPRK Never Makes Empty Talk: Mongolian TV
articles.content:
DPRK Never Makes Empty Talk: Mongolian TV
						
 Pyongyang, March 21 (KCNA) -- MNC TV of Mongolia made a special report on March 9 to air the statements issued by the spokesman for the DPRK Foreign Ministry recently.
					 It aired the footage of leader Kim Jong Il's inspection of Panmunjom, the dear respected Kim Jong Un's inspection of the island defence detachments in the biggest hotspot in the southernmost part of the southwestern sector of the front.
					
					 The UN Security Council passed another "resolution on sanctions" against the DPRK. However, it only made the DPRK react in a tougher manner, the report noted, adding:
					
					 As Kim Jong Il did, Kim Jong Un is meeting the pressure by the powers including the U.S. with toughest stance, relying on the country's strong military capabilities.
					
					 Kim Jong Un visited the frontline outposts with a few men on guard despite the extremely acute situation. Such fact clearly shows his pluck and will.
					
					 The history proves that the DPRK never makes an empty talk.
					
					 The DPRK never submits to others.
					
					 Its army and people are making full preparations to fight against the enemies under the command of their leader.
					
					 The DPRK's stand and demand should be respected in a bid to ease the hourly escalating tension.

articles.title: Day of Sun to Be Commemorated in Democratic Congo
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Be Commemorated in Democratic Congo
						
 Pyongyang, March 21 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee of Democratic Congo for commemorating the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung was inaugurated in Kinshasa on Mar. 14.
					 Otete Gaston Mboyo, deputy general secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Democratic Congo and chairman of the Democratic Congo-Korea Friendship and Solidarity Association, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The preparatory committee fixed the celebration period from Mar. 15 to Apr. 15 and decided to hold diverse events including meeting, seminar and photo exhibition.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Lauded by Personage of Democratic Congo
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Lauded by Personage of Democratic Congo
						
 Pyongyang, March 21 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung was the greatest man in the 20th century who founded the Juche idea illuminating the road for humankind to carve out their destiny and built a socialist country centered on popular masses independent in politics, self-supporting in the economy and self-reliant in national defence.
					 Otete Gaston Mboyo, deputy general secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Democratic Congo who doubles as chairman of the Democratic Congo-Korea Friendship and Solidarity Association, said this at an inaugural ceremony of the preparatory committee of Democratic Congo for commemorating the birth anniversary of the President (the Day of the Sun) on March 14.
					
					 The Day of the Sun, along with the august name of the President, has become a significant holiday of the world progressive people who love independence and justice, he added.

articles.title: Frustrara el chantaje nuclear de EE.UU., advierte Comandancia Suprema de EPC
articles.content:
Frustrara el chantaje nuclear de EE.UU., advierte Comandancia Suprema de EPC 
						
Pyongyang, 21 de marzo (ACNC) -- El ejercito y el pueblo de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea tienen la invariable voluntad y decision de defender la soberania del pais frustrando los actos hostiles de Estados Unidos y sus satelites contra la RPDC.
					Pero, EE.UU. actua absurdamente todavia para probar la voluntad de la RPDC y debilitar su decision con los brutales actos hostiles incluso el chantaje nuclear sin conocer a su contraparte.
					
					Insatisfecho con la intensificacion en el nivel peligroso de los ejercicios belicos "Key Resolve" y "Foal Eagle", emprende abiertamente el chantaje nuclear contra la RPDC introduciendo hasta los armamentos mortiferos cargados de ojivas nucleares. 
					
					Con respecto a esto, el portavoz de la Comandancia Suprema del Ejercito Popular de Corea dio el dia 21 la siguiente respuesta a la ACNC:
					
					Como ya aclaro la Comandancia Suprema del EPC, los ejercicios belicos conjuntos "Key Resolve" y "Foal Eagle" resultan evidentemente una peligrosa campana de guerra nuclear a continuacion de los mas crueles actos hostiles a la RPDC tendentes a violar su soberania y maximos intereses. 
					
					Tambien es la expresion concentrada del mas abierto rompimiento del Acuerdo de Armisticio de Corea y de todos los acuerdos Norte-Sur. 
					
					Por esta razon, tomamos la importante decision de invalidar completamente el Acuerdo de Armisticio, la declaracion de no agresion y la declaracion conjunta de desnuclearizacion aprobadas entre el Norte y el Sur de Corea. 
					
					Esta medida refleja la ferrea voluntad y decision de nuestro ejercito y pueblo de frustrar con nuestras armas nucleares la campana de guerra nuclear de EE.UU., sin restriccion alguna por tales acuerdos y declaraciones que ya perdieron su vigencia, y aniquilar a nuestras ganas todas las fuerzas hostiles que lisonjean a EE.UU. 
					
					Ahora EE.UU. introduce en el suelo surcoreano y la zona maritima de su contorno los bombarderos estrategicos B-52, los submarinos de propulsion nuclear y otros medios de ataque nuclear para probar la voluntad de la RPDC y debilitar su decision.
					
					La aviacion de cazabombarderos estrategicos cargados de ojivas nucleares, los submarinos de propulsion nuclear y los misiles balisticos intercontinentales forman "tres pilares nucleares" y "tres medios de ataque nuclear" de EE.UU. que son medios de chantaje 
					
					Lo que no se puede pasar por alto es que EE.UU. libra en el cielo y mar del Sur de Corea los ejercicios de ataque nuclear movilizando los cazabombarderos estrategicos B-52 y los submarinos de propulsion nuclear diciendo que esas armas son un mensaje de fuerte advertencia y que continuara tal amenaza y chantaje. 
					
					Nuestro ejercito y pueblo no se asustan nunca ante ese mensaje de advertencia, la amenaza y el chantaje de EE.UU. 
					
					El imperio no debe olvidarse de que estan al alcance de tiro de nuestros medios de ataque a precision la base aerea de Anderson en la isla Guam de donde despegan los B-52, el territorio japones y las bases navales de Okinawa de donde salen los submarinos de propulsion nuclear. 
					
					Dado que se iniciaron el abierto chantaje y amenaza nucleares de EE.UU., pasaremos a las acciones militares correspondientes al respecto. 
					
					No es una palabra vana la declaracion de la RPDC de responder a la amenaza nuclear de los enemigos con el ataque nuclear mas fuerte. 
					
					El mundo vera claramente cuan tragico sera el fin de los provocadores en la guerra de justicia de nuestro ejercito y pueblo levantados para defender la soberania.

articles.title: CRPP advierte a  provocadores de guerra nuclear
articles.content:
CRPP advierte a  provocadores de guerra nuclear
						
Pyongyang, 21 de marzo (ACNC) -- El portavoz del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria (CRPP) hizo publica el dia 20 una declaracion como sigue:
					En estos dias, debido a los simulacros de guerra de agresion contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea por los belicistas de Estados Unidos y el Sur de Corea que se libran locamente en el cielo, la tierra y el mar de esta parte, se ha creado en la Peninsula Coreana una situacion a punto de estallar en cualquier momento la guerra nuclear.
					
					El pasado dia 18, el subsecretario de Defensa estadounidense, Carter realizo un viaje al Sur de Corea, ocasion en la cual se reunio respectivamente con un relacionado de Chongwadae, el ministro de Defensa Nacional Kim Kwan Jin y el otro de Relaciones Exteriores Yun Pyong Se para tramar la conspiracion militar contra la RPDC. 
					
					Alli Carter prometio abiertamente establecer pronto la "estrategia del disuasivo de forma de ajuste" dirigida a asestar el ataque preventivo nuclear contra la RPDC. Dijo que EE.UU. movilizara para el Sur de Corea todas las fuerzas armadas de agresion inclusive el paraguas nuclear y la capacidad de ataque convencional y de defensa antimisil, asi que instigo a los titeres surcoreanos a la imprudente provocacion de guerra contra la RPDC.
					
					Y publico abiertamente que el bombardero estrategico B-52 de EE.UU. desarrollaria la prueba de lanzamiento de bombas nucleares en el espacio de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					Bajo pretexto de los ejercicios militares conjuntos "Foal Eagle", navegan en las aguas de la Peninsula Coreana los submarinos de EE.UU. cargados de misiles nucleares y hasta el bombardero estrategico nuclear realizo el entrenamiento de vuelo, razon por la cual llego a la extremidad la peligrosidad de estallido de guerra nuclear.
					
					Todos los hechos confirman que los presentes ejercicios militares no son los anuales de defensa sino los de guerra nuclear de caracter provocativo contra la RPDC.
					
					Hasta la fecha, EE.UU. buscaba la oportunidad de provocacion de guerra introduciendo anualmente en el Sur de Corea gran cantidad de pertrechos de guerra nuclear so pretexto de los ejercicios militares conjuntos.
					
					La realidad tan critica de hoy demuestra cuan justa es la posesion de armas nucleares para prevenir la guerra nuclear frente a la  incesante amenaza de guerra nuclear.
					
					Nadie podra negar que la paz y la estabilidad de la Peninsula Coreana se defiendan por las fuerzas disuasivas nucleares de la RPDC.
					
					Lo que EE.UU. y las fuerzas seguidoras arman alboroto de "sancion" cuestionando la posesion de armas nucleares de la RPDC es un acto criminal para desviar el verdadero aspecto del caso y agrandar la peligrosidad de guerra nuclear.
					
					Ya paso la epoca en que EE.UU. actua arbitrariamente amenazando a la RPDC con las armas nucleares.
					
					Es una gran equivocacion si EE.UU. calcula que pueda sorprender a alguien con el bombardero estrategico y submarino nuclear.
					
					EE.UU. debe saber correctamente que todos estos no se podran liberar de nuestra punteria.
					
					Antes de hablar del "ofrecimiento de promesa de defensa" al Sur de Corea, EE.UU. debe preocuparse por su destino tragico.
					
					Los provocadores de la guerra nuclear moriran quemados en el mar de fuego nuclear encendido por si mismos.

articles.title: Simposio central sobre obra de Kim Jong Un
articles.content:
Simposio central sobre obra de Kim Jong Un 
						
Pyongyang, 21 de marzo (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 21 en esta capital el simposio central para asimilar la idea y teorias iluminadas en el discurso resumen del Mariscal Kim Jong Un pronunciado en la IV Conferencia de los secretarios de celula del Partido del Trabajo de Corea.
					En este trabajo publicado el 29 de enero del 102 (2013) de la Era Juche se establecio el kimilsungismo-kimjongilismo como eterna idea directriz del PTC y la revolucion y se aclararon claramente los asuntos ideo-teoricos para transformar toda la sociedad segun el kimilsungismo-kimjongilismo.
					
					En la ocasion participaron el secretario del CC del PTC Kim Ki Nam, los funcionarios de las organizaciones del partido, administracion y las entidades de masas y los funcionarios de sectores de ciencia, educacion, literatura y arte, prensa e informacion, organos de formacion de funcionarios del partido y las reliquias historicas revolucionarias.
					
					En el simposio fueron publicadas las tesis que han explicado y probado la originalidad, la cientificidad, la veracidad y la vitalidad de las teorias ideologicas presentadas en la obra.
					
					Los oradores senalaron que la obra del Mariscal es guia que ilumino los medios fundamentales para realizar cabalmente el kimilsungismo-kimjongilismo, idea directriz del PTC.
					
					El Mariscal declaro la original idea de que el kimilsungismo-kimjongilismo, en su esencia, es conceder primacia a las masas populares, lo cual es la gran proeza ideo-teorica que indico de modo cientifico el espiritu y el ideal fundamentales del kimilsungismo-kimjongilismo y puso en la cimera su atraccion y vitalidad, subrayaron.
					
					Destacaron que al presentar la idea de unir a las amplias masas en torno al partido con el sentimiento fraternal, el Mariscal preparo la guia directiva que posibilita consolidar mas la unidad monolitica y abrir la nueva epoca.
					
					Enfatizaron que bajo la direccion del Mariscal todos los funcionarios, militantes del partido y trabajadores deben centuplicar de toda manera el poderio combativo del partido y adelantar la victoria final de la causa de la construccion de un Estado prospero enarbolando la bandera del kimilsungismo-kimjongilismo.
